name: NU_MeaslesTestsForMeaslesVirusIgGAntibody
title: NU_Measles (Tests for measles virus IgG Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Measles virus IgG Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Measles virus IgG Ab;  

LOINC search: 'Measles virus IgG Ab -rubella -panel -interpretation'),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
